text: “Soni chisimu chene ŵam’bichilile Yusufu kalakala ni ilosyo yakuonechela, basi ninganinneka kuŵa mu kaichila pa yajwaiche nayo kukwenu, kwikanila ndema jajwawile mwatite: ‘Allah nganaŵa atumisye panyuma pakwe ntenga jwalijose.” Iyyoyopeyo niyaakutiji Allah pakunnechelela kupotela mundu jwali jwakupelenganya malile (pakonanga), jwakaichila
